headers.subject: [tosdr:2049] [info] Canceled subscriptions continue until the next date of renewal

html:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and "other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


9.10. Canceling the services. You may cancel the services at any time, with or without cause. Information and direction on how to cancel your services is provided on theBilling and Account Management website (https://billing.microsoft.com). You should refer back to the offer describing the services as (i) you may not receive a refund at the time of cancellation; (ii) you may be obligated to pay cancellation charges; (iii) you may be obligated to pay all charges made to your billing account for the services before the date of cancellation; or (iv) you may lose access to and use of your account when you cancel the services. If you cancel, your services end at the end of your current service period or, if we bill your account on a periodic basis, at the end of the period in which you canceled.

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [info] Canceled subscriptions continue until the next date of renewal
text:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, 
profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo 
Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and 
"other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough 
Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


9.10. Canceling the services. You may cancel the services at any time, with 
> or without cause. Information and direction on how to cancel your services 
> is provided on theBilling and Account Management<https://billing.microsoft.com/> website 
> (https://billing.microsoft.com). You should refer back to the offer 
> describing the services as (i) you may not receive a refund at the time of 
> cancellation; (ii) you may be obligated to pay cancellation charges; (iii) 
> you may be obligated to pay all charges made to your billing account for 
> the services before the date of cancellation; or (iv) you may lose access 
> to and use of your account when you cancel the services. If you cancel, 
> your services end at the end of your current service period or, if we bill 
> your account on a periodic basis, at the end of the period in which you 
> canceled.
>
>  
>
> From <
> http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement
> > 
>

--
